author: Chris-TalkTalk
title: Re: BROADBAND
text:
Get expert support with your Fibre connection.
Monday
My broadband drops out during busy usage .for example when strictly is being broadcast.I am on CityFibre,I had no trouble when I was on copper wire.
38 minutes ago
Hi FCPETERS,
Could you explain what happens when it drops out
Thanks
Chris
Chris, Community Team
[Our latest Blog](/blog) l [Share your Ideas](/ideas) l [Service Status](/servicestatus) l [Help with your Service](/t5/Help-with-your-TalkTalk-service/ct-p/help) l [Community Stars](/t5/custom/page/page-id/SuperUserHub) l Set your preferences
yesterday
Hi Michelle,
Thank you for replying to my problem; the router is the one installed when City Fibre installed the cable.The problem only affects the television and only started about three weeks ago.
Regards I Cooper
Wednesday
Morning,
How are you getting on?
Thanks
Michelle
Monday
Good morning,
I'm sorry to hear this. Are you currently using an eero or a wifi hub router? Does the connection drop on all devices at the same time or just the one device please?
Thanks
Michelle
